Package org.daisy.common.xproc.calabash

Xproc-api implementation based on calabash

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationFileProvider  
    XProcConfigurationFactory
    Factory for creating XProcConfiguration objects.
    XProcStep
    XProcStep that also implements the XMLTransformer API.
    XProcStepProvider
    The Interface XProcStepProvider.
    XProcStepRegistry
    The Interface XProcStepRegistry sets the behaviour for step registration
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BundledConfigurationFileProvider  
    CalabashXProcError
    Wraps a XProcException in a XProcError.
    XMLCalabashInputValue  
    XMLCalabashOptionValue
    The StringWithNamespaceContext interface is only relevant if the option value is of type "string".
    XMLCalabashOutputValue  
    XMLCalabashParameterInputValue  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CalabashExceptionFromXProcError
    Wraps a XProcError in a XProcException.
